title: Wrong username/password bug
body: me and my brother cannot sign in due to this bug

replies.body: Are you guys connected to the NA region on the login screen?  Is this issue still happening?
I'm connected to NA and I just came across this. I even changed my password.
Yes...said reverted to previous version and was going to attempt to patch up. Never patched and wont take password

Same behavior for me.  There was what I think may have been an error message saying it had reverted to a previous version of the installer and would try to update.  The update never happens and my login information is invalid / doesn't work.
